campaigns.title: Meet - AI Virtual Background 4K Webcam
campaigns.description: The first-ever 4K webcam that embended AI technology to protect your background during video calls.
campaigns.story:
Capture everything in 4k, with extended battery life and pro-g inspired features. Choose from three 4k recording modes: UHD, HD and cinematic 24p. Use the wi-fi feature to connect and stream your footage wirelessly directly to your iOS and Android smartphones or tablets for instant sharing. The monitor has a 3.5" touch screen for easy navigation and built-in wi-fi that automatically connects to the last used smartphone or tablet once paired.

Built with an advanced 4K image sensor and a Super 35 imaging processer the GH4 is able to capture cinema quality images with astonishing detail. This camera has evolved into a great all-rounder for photography or film-making.

Digital Camera

  1. Images can be instantly checked, and retaken if necessary.
  2. Black and White and sepia-tone photos can be easily created.
  3. Macro photography lets you shoot down to a few centimeters away
  4. Most digital cameras can also take moving pictures.
  5. No film purchase or development costs, Rechargeable battery packs are economicalðŸ¤‘ðŸ¤‘ðŸ¤‘.
  6. Macro photography lets you shoot down to a few centimeters away.
